root.name: Advanced Daisenryaku: Deutsch Dengeki Sakusen
root.description: OverviewAdvanced Daisenryaku: Deutsch Dengeki Sakusen is a turn-based strategy game developed by SystemSoft and published by Sega for the Sega Genesis platform. Released in 1991, it was one of the first games to support online multiplayer over the Sega MegaNet service.
